page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{ EMPLOYMENT
Only a small percentage of the working population,some two thousand people,is actually employed in the parish.But with the good opportunities available in the larger towns, all within a ten mile radius,and a low rate of local unemployment,finding work in the neighbourhood does not seem to present a serious problem to{Box residents.There are three or four small manufacturing companies,the administrative section of a company of motor factors, and a storage depot for animal feed.One of the few factories is{Sparfax Ditteridge.}They are situated in{Chaney Court}a one time hotel and employ 13 people making components for television.
